participant_1.background:
I like to cook with my mom and we try new recipes every week.
i am stuck in the past due to remoteness.
i have never traveled out of the country.
I enjoy my time with my family on the beach, but I don't always keep up with them.
My most valued material possession is my cast iron skillet, because it is a versatile tool that I can use to cook a variety of delicious dishes.

participant_2.background:
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
my favorite band is bon over.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.

content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
Pretty good! I'm about to go to a Halloween party.  What are you up to?
I'm stuck in the past due to remoteness.  I've never been out of the country.
Oh no!  You need to get out there and experience the world!  I've been to a few places, but I want to go to more.
I'd love to, but it's hard to get away from here.  I do enjoy my time with my family on the beach, though.
That sounds nice!  I love the beach.  I've been going to the beach since I was a little kid.

I love cooking with my mom and we try new recipes every week.  My most valued material possession is my cast iron skillet, because it is a versatile tool that I can use to cook a variety of delicious dishes.
That's awesome!  I love cooking too.  I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new things.
It is!  I'm pretty good at it.  I'm always looking for new recipes to try.  What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Bon Jovi.  They're so good!  I love their music.
I've heard of them, but I've never listened to them.
You should!  They're really good.
I will!  Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and cook.  I also like to go to the beach and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I like to read, watch movies, and go to the beach too.  I don't spend much time with my family, though.
I'm sorry to hear that.  I love spending time with my family.
Me too.  I just don't get to see them very often.
I know how that feels.  I live pretty far away from my family.
Me too.  They live in a different state.
That's tough.  I'm lucky that my family lives close by.
Me too.  I wish I could see them more often.
I know the feeling.
